content.p: If you would like any more information about the centre please contact the SPMIC administrative team. If you have any issues with the running of the Centre please contact the Centre Manager in the first instance, or the Centre Director (Richard Bowtell) or the chair of the Science Committee (Mike Akeroyd). The Sir Peter Mansfield Imaging Centre (SPMIC) is built around a number of research themes: Further details on each of the research themes can be found on the Research section of our website. The Sir Peter Mansfield Imaging Centre (SPMIC) is supported by an External Advisory Board, with the following members:
